rapid 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

R API definition object

Source: R/99-rapid.R
rapid.Rd

An object that represents an API.

Usage

rapid(
  info = S7::class_missing,
  servers = S7::class_missing,
  ...,
  apid_url = NULL,
  apid_list = NULL
)

Arguments

info

An api_info object defined by api_info().

servers

A servers object defined by servers().

...

Catch-all for unimplemented properties.

apid_url

The url for an API document.

apid_list

An API document as a list, such as that obtained by reading an OAS document with yaml::read_yaml().

Value

A rapid S7 object, with properties info and servers.

Examples

rapid()
#> <rapid::rapid>
#>  @ info   : <rapid::api_info>
#>  .. @ contact         : <rapid::api_contact>
#>  .. .. @ name : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ email: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url  : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ description     : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ license         : <rapid::api_license>
#>  .. .. @ name      : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ identifier: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url       : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ summary         : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ terms_of_service: chr(0) 
#>  .. @ title           : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ version         : chr(0) 
#>  @ servers: <rapid::servers>
#>  .. @ url        : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ description: chr(0) 
#>  .. @ variables  : <rapid::server_variable_list>  list()
rapid(
  info = api_info(title = "A", version = "1"),
  servers(
    url = "https://development.gigantic-server.com/v1"
  )
)
#> <rapid::rapid>
#>  @ info   : <rapid::api_info>
#>  .. @ contact         : <rapid::api_contact>
#>  .. .. @ name : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ email: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url  : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ description     : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ license         : <rapid::api_license>
#>  .. .. @ name      : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ identifier: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url       : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ summary         : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ terms_of_service: chr(0) 
#>  .. @ title           : chr "A"
#>  .. @ version         : chr "1"
#>  @ servers: <rapid::servers>
#>  .. @ url        : chr "https://development.gigantic-server.com/v1"
#>  .. @ description: chr(0) 
#>  .. @ variables  : <rapid::server_variable_list>  list()
rapid(
  info = api_info(title = "A", version = "1"),
  servers(
    url = c(
      "https://development.gigantic-server.com/v1",
      "https://staging.gigantic-server.com/v1",
      "https://api.gigantic-server.com/v1"
    ),
    description = c(
      "Development server",
      "Staging server",
      "Production server"
    )
  )
)
#> <rapid::rapid>
#>  @ info   : <rapid::api_info>
#>  .. @ contact         : <rapid::api_contact>
#>  .. .. @ name : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ email: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url  : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ description     : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ license         : <rapid::api_license>
#>  .. .. @ name      : chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ identifier: chr(0) 
#>  .. .. @ url       : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ summary         : chr(0) 
#>  .. @ terms_of_service: chr(0) 
#>  .. @ title           : chr "A"
#>  .. @ version         : chr "1"
#>  @ servers: <rapid::servers>
#>  .. @ url        : chr [1:3] "https://development.gigantic-server.com/v1" ...
#>  .. @ description: chr [1:3] "Development server" "Staging server" ...
#>  .. @ variables  : <rapid::server_variable_list>  list()
